title: Nova Miningverse
author: Nova Miningverse
content: https://twitter.com/Novaminingverse/status/1532043000821567491Create an original character illustration to take part in the challenge! Post it on Twitter with the hashtags #novaminingverse #novacontest and tag us! We will pick 5 finalists on June 30th and run a community vote in the next 24h to decide the top 3 (and rewards voters) 👀mage size: 1000x1000 pxDeadline: June 30th 1st place -$10002nd place - $7503rd place - $250Once the winners are declared, we will pay the prizes in #bitcoin mined on our hydro facilities.Good luck! 🍀It is worth mentioning that only participants who follow us will be eligible for both prizes ⛏️$200 $BTC bonus round 😏Like & Retweet the main tweet, we will be rewarding 1 random lucky winner when the main contest ends 💰https://twitter.com/Novaminingverse/status/1532043000821567491

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Please send your prizes to trusted escrow in this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2439910.0Otherwise everyone should stay away and high risk of getting scammed.
